titleStmt.title: The law of laws: or, The excellency of the civil lavv, above all humane lavvs whatsoever. Shewing of how great use and necessity the civil law is to this nation. / By Ro: Wiseman, Dr of the civil law.
titleStmt.author: Wiseman, Robert, Sir, 1613-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
"Lex legum: .. The second part" has separate title page dated 1656; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
